name: Light-fingered
description:
An agile thief entered a run-down cathedral to loot the place. But this time they have to pay the price.

Loot the place! Find 4 levers to open the main door and escape. Be aware, the curse is following your step, always just behind you. You can't hide from it, you can't outrun it, all you can do is delay your demise. Or maybe there is something you could do?

Be careful about your inventory weight. Each item makes your stamina regeneration slower. The curse is getting more and more vicious as you continue to stay inside.

WASD - Run

Spacebar - Jump

Ctrl / Shift - Slide 

E - interact/pick up

Scroll Mouse Wheel - select items in your inventory

LMB - Use selected item with  (only works with potions)

RMB - Drop item with 

I - invert y-axis mouse control

Crouch while running and you'll slide

Jump while sliding and you'll preform a fast slide jump

Jump near a wall on your left or right to jump off of it, gaining more height
